AI Description: BamUtil is a versatile utility that provides a range of operations for manipulating BAM files, which are binary versions of the Sequence Alignment/Map (SAM) format used in bioinformatics for storing mapped sequencing data. It offers a variety of functions for sorting, merging, indexing, and filtering BAM files efficiently.
Core Features: Sorting Bam Files, Merging Bam Files, Indexing Bam Files, Filtering Bam Files
General Tags: Bam Files, Sequence Alignment/Map Format, Bioinformatics, Data Manipulation
